aboutMe.heading: About Me
aboutMe.content: I am currently enrolled in an MVoc in Software Application Development at CUSAT under the DDUKK department, where I build pragmatic and industry-specific tech abilities. Earlier, I was an employee at Bumberry as a Marketing Associate, with core work in Digital Marketing—campaign management, content strategy, and digital brand presence. Through this, I developed essential non-technical skills such as communication, planning, and flexibility. My Computer Applications degree from SSTM provided a foundation for my interest in programming, web development, and design. As a freelance, I have done 3D modeling using Blender, scripting with Lua, and game development for Roblox (using the username CREED_3056). I'm also familiar with software such as DaVinci Resolve and Shopify, and I regularly delve into AI-based technologies to improve the quality and creativity of my output.

skillsSection.heading: Skills
skillsList: Web Dev (HTML, CSS, JS, Bootstrap, PHP, MySQL)

goalsSection.heading: My Goals
goalsSection.goalDescription: To continuously learn, innovate, and deliver quality software and design solutions to real-world problems.
